就寝中の女性に「金、金」…布団を覆いかぶせ２千万円奪う

03 Nov 2019, 00:55

　２日午前０時半頃、高松市内の無職女性（８３）宅に何者かが押し入り、１階寝室で寝ていた女性を「金、金」と脅迫。両手首をテープで固定して布団を覆いかぶせ、現金約２０００万円入りの金庫やハンドバッグなどを奪って逃走した。女性は両手を打撲する軽傷。香川県警高松南署が強盗致傷事件として捜査している。
　発表によると、女性は一人暮らし。少なくとも３人の姿を見たと話しているが、性別や特徴はわからないという。１階居間の窓ガラスが割れており、同署はここから侵入したとみている。自宅の防犯センサーが反応し、駆けつけた警備員が１１０番した。
text:
Covering a sleeping woman with “gold, money”… covering a futon and taking 20 million yen

03 Nov 2019, 00:55

At around 0:30 am on the 2nd, an unemployed woman in Takamatsu city (83) entered someone's home and threatened the woman who was sleeping in the bedroom on the first floor as “gold, money”. He fixed his wrists with tape and covered the futon, and ran away with a safe and handbag with about 20 million yen in cash. Women have minor injuries that bruise both hands. Kagawa Prefectural Police Takamatsu Minami Station is investigating as a burglary and injury case.
According to the announcement, women live alone. He said he saw at least three people, but he did n’t know gender or characteristics. The window glass on the first floor is broken, and the station believes that it has invaded here. The security sensor at home reacted, and the security guard rushed to No.110.
